english.segment1: More love, more power. More of You in my life. More love, more power. More of You in my life
english.segment2: I will worship You with all of my heart. And I will worship You with all of my mind. And I will worship You with all of my strength. For you are my Lord. You are my Lord
english.segment3: More faith, more passion. More of You in my life. More faith, more passion. More of You in my life
english.segment4: I will worship You with all of my heart. And I will worship You with all of my mind. And I will worship You with all of my strength. For you are my Lord. You are my Lord
english.segment5: More love, more power. More of You in my life. More love, more power. More of You in my life
english.segment6: I will worship You with all of my heart. And I will worship You with all of my mind. And I will worship You with all of my strength. For you are my Lord. You are my Lord (2x).
